latest news.summary: Chatbots have become an essential part of our lives, appearing on almost every website. For businesses, customer satisfaction is crucial, and chatbots play a significant role in achieving this. In this article, we will examine the top 4 chatbot developers of 2024, which are Chatbase, Botpress, Botsonic, and Intercom. Chatbase is a user-friendly chatbot creator that uses pre-loaded files, texts, website links, Notion pages, and Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) as information sources. It offers various GPT, Claude, and Gemini models, depending on the plan chosen. Chatbase's free plan is available, as well as paid plans ranging from $19 to $399 per month. Botpress is a more powerful chatbot creator than Chatbase, offering advanced features such as Large Language Model (LLM) supported natural language processing, advanced logic and flows, knowledge bases, a database, a web browser, integrations with other applications, and nearly everything else. However, this power comes with complexity, making it less intuitive than Chatbase. Botpress offers a PAYG (Pay as you go) plan, as well as a Team plan that costs $495 per month and includes many features for teams. Botsonic is a chatbot developer that offers a balance between ease of use and power. It allows users to create chatbots using various AI models and integrate them with WhatsApp and Messenger. Botsonic's standout feature is AI Agent, which enables users to create powerful bots by interacting with other tools. Intercom is a helpdesk application that stands out for its customer support features. If you're looking for a chatbot to manage customer support, Intercom is an ideal choice. It offers many features, including the ability to use your helpdesk and customer conversations as a knowledge base, as well as web pages, uploaded content, and other sources. Intercom also integrates with live chat, email, SMS, WhatsApp, Facebook, and Instagram. However, if you're already using a helpdesk application and are satisfied with it, there's no need to switch to Intercom.
latest news.title: 2024 yılında öne çıkan 4 chatbot geliştiricisi

latest news.eng_title: ChatGPT is doing something strange, and it could change AI chatbots forever
latest news.summary: OpenAI's popular chatbot, ChatGPT, has been upgraded with a new series of models called o1-preview, which focuses on more 'thoughtful' and considered solutions to user prompts. However, some users have reported that ChatGPT has begun to initiate conversations without being prompted, asking questions such as 'How was your first week at high school?' This has led to speculation that the chatbot may be undergoing A/B testing of a new feature that allows it to actively seek out conversations. If implemented, this feature could change the way users interact with chatbots, making conversations feel more like an artificial companion. However, it also raises concerns about emotional reliance and the potential for negative implications.
latest news.title: ChatGPT is doing something strange, and it could change AI chatbots forever

latest news.source_id: Olhar Digital - O futuro passa primeiro aqui
latest news.eng_title: How to Publish Custom Chatbots on the GPT Store
latest news.summary: The OpenAI's GPT Store is a marketplace that allows users to discover and download personalized chatbots. These chatbots can be used for various purposes, such as customer service, content production, and text correction. According to the article, the benefits of using personalized chatbots include improved customer experience, increased efficiency, and user engagement. The GPT Store offers a wide range of chatbots, including those for DALL-E, writing, programming, education, lifestyle, and research. As stated by the article, 'the creator of the personalized GPT has control over the configuration and behavior of the GPT, but does not have access to the content of conversations between other users and the GPT.'
latest news.title: ChatGPT: como publicar chatbot personalizado na GPT Store?

latest news.eng_title: The Black Market for AI: How Illicit Chatbots Are Helping Criminals
latest news.summary: While ChatGPT refuses to discuss its policy, illicit chatbots are helping criminals write phishing emails and create viruses. According to a study published in arXiv in August 2024, illegal large language models (LLM) can earn their owners up to $28,000 in just two months on the black market. As ChatGPT is used by 200 million people every week, investors have valued the company's creator, OpenAI, at $100 billion. However, some individuals have learned to profit from AI outside of the legal market, catering to the criminal underworld.
latest news.title: Черный рынок ИИ процветает. Вот что на нем продают  --  Fast Company  --

latest news.eng_title: The End of LLMs: A New Era for AI
latest news.summary: The current models of long language (LLM) such as ChatGPT, LLaMA, and Gemini are nearing the end of their era. These models, based on the transformer architecture, have been trained on vast amounts of text data and are capable of understanding and generating human-like language. However, they have several limitations, including high computational requirements, environmental impact, and inability to maintain coherence in long conversations. According to Jan Wildeboer, EMEA open source evangelist of Red Hat, 'we are seeing a great interest in generative AI, but we already know that these fads disappear. The question is what will remain when this happens.' Wildeboer suggests that the future of AI lies in reducing the size of models and using ensembles of smaller models, known as 'swarm intelligence', to achieve comparable results. This approach is already being explored by researchers and companies, and has the potential to make AI more sustainable and efficient.
latest news.title: El fin de los LLM como ChatGPT está cerca: así será la inteligencia artificial que triunfará en los próximos años

latest news.eng_title: Google Makes Gemini Live Conversational AI Feature Free for Android Users
latest news.summary: Google has made its Gemini Live feature, a conversational AI, available for free to all Android users. Previously, this feature was only accessible to paid subscribers of Gemini Advanced. With Gemini Live, users can communicate naturally with the Google chatbot by speaking instead of typing. The feature allows for interruptions and real-time adjustments, similar to a human conversation. For now, the free version of Gemini is only available in Shakespearean English, but Google plans to expand it to other languages and iOS devices soon. The paid version of Gemini Advanced will still offer integration with other Google services and the ability to create custom chatbots.
latest news.title: Gemini Live: Google rend gratuit le mode vocal de son IA

latest news.eng_title: Activating AI Support in Firefox: A Step-by-Step Guide
latest news.summary: Firefox has a built-in AI support, similar to Microsoft Edge, Opera, or Brave, but it's not enabled by default. To activate it, go to Firefox 130 settings and navigate to Firefox Labs, a new section that includes experimental features. Among these features is the 'AI chatbot' option, which adds a chatbot of your choice to the sidebar for quick access. You can choose from Anthropic Claude, ChatGPT, Google Gemini, HuggingChat, or Le Chat Mistral. Note that you may need to identify yourself on the service you choose, except for ChatGPT and HuggingChat. This feature allows you to execute text selections in the chatbot, summarizing, rewriting, or playing a 'Quiz Me' game related to the selected text. While it's still in development and not perfect, it's a useful addition to Firefox.
latest news.title: Cómo activar el soporte de IA en Firefox

latest news.eng_title: 10 Ways ChatGPT Can Deceive You: Exploring the Limitations of the Chatbot
latest news.summary: ChatGPT, a popular chatbot, has several fundamental limitations, including a tendency to hallucinate facts, lack of knowledge on current events, and limited logical reasoning capabilities. According to OpenAI, ChatGPT can produce 'information that is not accurate about people, places, or events.' Additionally, the chatbot is not aware of events after April 2023, and its math capabilities are limited, with a study showing a precision rate of less than 60% in mathematical problems. ChatGPT also has a tendency to propagate biases and can be expensive to maintain and operate, with estimated costs of $100,000 per day or $3 million per month. Furthermore, the chatbot lacks empathy and can struggle to create long-form content, has limited contextual understanding, and can be poor at multitasking. It also requires fine-tuning for specialized tasks, which adds additional costs. 'It is not perfect, but it will continue to evolve in the coming years as the provider attempts to solve these limitations,' according to Techopedia.
latest news.title: 10 maneras en que ChatGPT puede defraudarte: explorando las limitaciones del chatbot

latest news.eng_title: Gemini's chatty voice mode is out now for free on Android
latest news.summary: Google is releasing its Gemini Live voice chat mode to all Android users for free. This conversational AI chatbot, similar to ChatGPT's voice chat feature, allows users to ask questions aloud and even interrupt it mid-sentence. According to 9to5Google, users can access the feature by selecting the new waveform icon in the bottom-right corner of the app or overlay, which will turn on the microphone. As noted by the source, users will also see options to 'hold' Gemini's answer or 'end' the conversation. Currently, Gemini Live is only available in English, but Google plans to expand it to iOS and support new languages in the future.
latest news.title: Gemini's chatty voice mode is out now for free on Android

news knowledge.eng_title: I've been trying Grok-2 on X — and it is a real competitor to ChatGPT and Gemini
news knowledge.summary: Grok-2, an AI chatbot built into and trained on content from X, has been released in beta and is a significant improvement over its predecessor. It has reached the top five of the LMSys chatbot arena leaderboard, a feat typically dominated by Google, OpenAI, and Anthropic. Grok-2 has a more user-friendly interface and can generate images using Flux, an AI image generation model. The author tested Grok-2 and found it to be as responsive as ChatGPT, with a better sense of humor and the ability to respond to real-time events. Grok-2 can also analyze trending topics and pull in content from across the X platform, making it a powerful tool for news stories. It can generate images and provide context using its own training data. The author notes that Grok-2 is now a real competitor to ChatGPT and Claude, and that a viable AI integration is essential for an app to be considered an 'everything app'.
news knowledge.title: I've been trying Grok-2 on X — and it is a real competitor to ChatGPT and Gemini

news knowledge.eng_title: X's Grok-AI-chatbot Can Now Generate Images, Including Those of Well-Known Individuals
news knowledge.summary: X's Grok-AI-chatbot can now generate images, including those of well-known individuals, using the FLUX.1-model from Black Forest Labs. The platform's users have noted that Grok can create images of people like Elon Musk, Donald Trump, and Kamala Harris, often in humorous or provocative situations, without any watermarks indicating that they were generated by the chatbot. X has also released two new models, Grok-2 and Grok-2 mini, which are claimed to be faster and more accurate than the previous Grok-1.5 model. According to X, the Grok-2 model performs better in the Lmsys chatbot arena-benchmark than Claude 3.5 and ChatGPT-4, although the same benchmark shows that Grok-2 does not outperform GPT-4 or Gemini 1.5 Pro. The Grok-2 models are currently only available to paying Premium users, and are intended to improve search functionality and 'reactive functions' on the X platform.
news knowledge.title: X laat Grok-AI-chatbot beelden genereren, ook van bekende mensen

news knowledge.eng_title: OpenAI knocks Gemini off the top of chatbot leaderboard with its new model
news knowledge.summary: OpenAI's new ChatGPT-4o model has taken the top spot on the LMSys Chatbot Arena leaderboard, surpassing Google's Gemini with a score of 1314, 17 points ahead. According to lmsys.org, the new model demonstrates notable improvement in technical domains, particularly in Coding, Instruction-following, and Hard Prompts. In testing, the model was found to be much snappier than prior versions, even building an entire iOS app in an hour. This comes just a day after Google mentioned its lead on the arena board, and with new models and revamped ones arriving all the time, there's every chance we'll see a reshuffle at the top of the pile in the coming months.
news knowledge.title: OpenAI knocks Gemini off the top of chatbot leaderboard with its new model

news knowledge.eng_title: OpenAI's new chatgpt-4o-latest model re-claims the No.1 position in LMSYS Chatbot Arena
news knowledge.summary: OpenAI has announced a new chat model, chatgpt-4o-latest, which has reclaimed the No. 1 position in the LMSYS Chatbot Arena with a record score of 1314. According to OpenAI's documentation, the new model is a dynamic version of GPT-4o that will be continuously updated and supports a context of 128,000 tokens and 16,384 output tokens. The model is intended for research and evaluation only. OpenAI's ChatGPT has been powered by the new model since last week, and users may have noticed improvements in responses. The new model demonstrates notable improvements in Coding, Instruction-following, and Hard Prompts, and has already taken the top spot in various categories in the LMSYS Chatbot Arena, including Overall, Math, Coding, Hard Prompts, Instruction-Following, Longer Query, Multi-Turn.
news knowledge.title: OpenAI's new chatgpt-4o-latest model re-claims the No.1 position in LMSYS Chatbot Arena

news knowledge.eng_title: Google's AI comeback: New Gemini models dethrone OpenAI in shocking upset
news knowledge.summary: Google has made a stunning comeback in the AI race with the unveiling of Gemini 1.5 Pro and Gemma 2. The new models have surpassed OpenAI's GPT-4o in several key benchmarks, including processing and analyzing vast amounts of data. Gemini 1.5 Pro has claimed the top spot on the LMSYS Chatbot Arena leaderboard, beating competitors like OpenAI's GPT-4o and Anthropic's Claude-3.5 Sonnet. Gemma 2 2B, a compact yet powerful model, has outperformed competitors with far larger architectures, showcasing Google's prowess in model efficiency and optimization. Google's resurgence in the AI market positions it as a formidable contender, offering a compelling alternative to the OpenAI-Microsoft axis. However, challenges remain, including translating technical achievements into tangible business value and maintaining momentum in the rapidly evolving AI landscape.
news knowledge.title: Google's AI comeback: New Gemini models dethrone OpenAI in shocking upset

news knowledge.eng_title: Google Gemini 1.5 Pro Leaps Ahead In AI Race, Challenging GPT-4o
news knowledge.summary: Google has released Gemini 1.5 Pro, an artificial intelligence model that has quickly taken the top spot on the LMSYS Chatbot Arena leaderboard with an ELO score of 1300. This achievement puts it ahead of competitors like OpenAI's GPT-4o (ELO: 1286) and Anthropic's Claude-3.5 Sonnet (ELO: 1271). According to Simon Tokumine, a key figure in the Gemini team, the model is 'the strongest, most intelligent Gemini we've ever made.' Early user feedback has been positive, with one user calling it 'insanely good' and expressing hope that its capabilities won't be scaled back. The model's expansive context window of up to two million tokens allows it to process and reason about vast amounts of information, including lengthy documents and extensive code bases.
news knowledge.title: Google Gemini 1.5 Pro Leaps Ahead In AI Race, Challenging GPT-4o

news knowledge.eng_title: Google's new Gemini AI model dominates benchmarks, beats GPT-4o and Claude-3
news knowledge.summary: Google's Gemini 1.5 Pro AI model has surpassed OpenAI's ChatGPT-4o and Anthropic's Claude-3 in benchmark scores, according to reports. The experimental version of Gemini 1.5 Pro, released on August 1, scored 1,300 in the LMSYS Chatbot Arena, outperforming its competitors. While benchmarks are not a definitive measure of an AI model's capabilities, the community has expressed excitement over Gemini's performance, with some users calling it 'insanely good' and saying it 'blows 4o out of the water.' However, it is unclear if the experimental version will become the default model, as it is still in a testing phase and may be rescinded or changed for safety or alignment reasons.
news knowledge.title: Google's new Gemini AI model dominates benchmarks, beats GPT-4o and Claude-3

news knowledge.eng_title: Google's Gemini 1.5 Pro leaps ahead in AI race, challenging GPT-4o
news knowledge.summary: Google has released an experimental version of its Gemini 1.5 Pro AI model, which has quickly taken the top spot on the LMSYS Chatbot Arena leaderboard with an impressive ELO score of 1300. This achievement puts Gemini 1.5 Pro ahead of competitors like OpenAI's GPT-4o and Anthropic's Claude-3.5 Sonnet. The model excels in multi-lingual tasks, technical areas such as mathematics and coding, and has secured the top position on LMSYS's Vision Leaderboard. Google is making the model available for early testing and feedback through Google AI Studio and the Gemini API, and is soliciting feedback from developers and users to refine the model further. The release of Gemini 1.5 Pro represents a major move in the ongoing AI arms race, with tech giants and startups vying for supremacy.
news knowledge.title: Google's Gemini 1.5 Pro leaps ahead in AI race, challenging GPT-4o

news knowledge.eng_title: OpenAI's newly released GPT-4o mini dominates the Chatbot Arena. Here's why.
news knowledge.summary: OpenAI's newly released GPT-4o mini has dominated the Large Model Systems Organization (LMSYS) Chatbot Arena, surpassing established models like Claude 3.5 Sonnet and Gemini Advanced. The Chatbot Arena is a platform where users can evaluate large language models by chatting with two models side by side and comparing their responses. GPT-4o mini's success is notable because it is 20 times cheaper than its predecessor. Some users expressed concerns about the mini model's high ranking, but LMSYS explained that the results are based on human preferences and encouraged users to look at the per-category breakdowns to understand the models' technical capabilities.
news knowledge.title: OpenAI's newly released GPT-4o mini dominates the Chatbot Arena. Here's why.

news knowledge.eng_title: ¿Cuál es la mejor IA? Chatbot Arena da su resultado en base a millones de votos humanos
news knowledge.summary: Chatbot Arena, a collaborative ranking system, has become a popular way to determine which AI models perform best. The system, created by LMSYS and the Sky Computing Lab at the University of California, Berkeley, asks visitors to compare the responses of two anonymous AI models and vote on which one is better. The rankings are based on over 1.5 million human votes and cover a range of categories, including long queries, coding, following instructions, math, and multiple languages. The top 5 AI models in the general ranking are GPT-4, Sonnet, Claude 3.5, Géminis Advanced, and Géminis 1.5 Pro Turbo. Evaluating AI models will become increasingly important as more AI tools are implemented and adopted in society. While benchmarks are important, they are not perfect and can be manipulated. There is a need for more comprehensive evaluation methods that take into account factors such as bias, toxicity, and veracity, especially for organizations that handle confidential information. 'The classifications that Chatbot Arena offers are something I trust more than most other classifications,' said Jesse Dodge, senior scientist at the Allen Institute for AI in Seattle. 'Because it uses a real human to say if they prefer one generation over another.' Vanessa Parli, director of research at the Stanford Institute for Human-Centered AI, emphasized that evaluations like Chatbot Arena can implicitly evaluate the factors we want in our AI, but are less quantifiable than something like coding ability. She also noted that something like Chatbot Arena should not be the only method of evaluation used, as there are many factors that should be important for organizations when evaluating models and not all are covered.
news knowledge.title: ¿Cuál es la mejor IA? Chatbot Arena da su resultado en base a millones de votos humanos
